alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:52PM AKST until January 01 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be extremely hazardous due to blowing snow with low visibility down to a half mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop tonight, and then transition to a rain snow mix by Sunday afternoon. The winds combined with the snow will create low visibility down to a half mile due to blowing snow. Additionally, as snow transitions to a wintry mix in the afternoon travel could be especially difficult due to slushy and icy conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
